All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Readable
public class XmlVersionReader
extends BufferedReader

This reader makes the XML version of the XML document in the character stream available.

getXmlVersion

public String getXmlVersion()
Returns:
Returns the XML version read from the character stream. If there is XML prolog given, then version "1.0" is assumed and returned.
